data.title: Herman Waldmann awarded 2023 Royal Medal from the Royal Society

data.text:
LMB 1978-1979, Sabbatical Visitor, PNAC

The Royal Society has awarded Herman Waldmann the Royal Medal 2023 to mark his important contributions to the advancement of knowledge in biological science. Specifically, Herman was recognised for his pioneering research applying monoclonal antibodies for human therapy. Whilst at the LMB, he worked closely with Cesar Milstein and was instrumental in helping Greg Winter introduce humanised antibodies in patients. Moreâ€¦
